meaningMnemonic: This <radical>tree</radical> <radical>turkey</radical> has been sitting directly on your <kanji>spine</kanji> for weeks straight. The pain is starting to become unbearable, and it seems like no one wants to help you.
readingMnemonic: Just as your <kanji>spine</kanji> seems to be getting used to the pressure, the tree turkey unleashes a cry: "<reading>TWEE</reading>T (つい)!" To your horror, a flock of tree turkeys emerge from the trees.
